name: Zen (Joshua Wuan)
description:
Zen is a timing based game, taking the form of a mobile game.

Complete the yin-yang symbol  in order to gain score.

Game Jam

Zen is a submission for the Cult of Jabril(s) game Jam September 2018 Game Jam. 

Here, 48 hours were given to make a game within the theme of; 'Black and White".

Being a new Developer, I had decided to go for a simplistic game, which I had knew I was able to finish within the time given.

Instructions

Install  and export Zen.zip

Launch; Zen >> Zen.exe

Use "space" when the yin-yang symbol is connected.
